" This executable program has a file size of 6,554,320 bytes, it is most frequently called LIMEWIREWIN.EXE and is most frequently located in the %cache%\ folder.
The file header contains the following information:
Vendor : Lime Wire LLC
Product: The Fastest File Sharing Program on Earth

This file has not yet been classified as safe. It was first seen on Friday, Jan 11 2008. It has been seen frequently by 24 users in this section of the community. The file was first seen in SWEDEN but has been seen in other locations, including SPAIN.
LIMEWIREWIN.EXE has been seen to perform the following behaviors:
- This Process Creates Other Processes On Disk
- Executes a Process
- Adds Products to the system registry
- This Process Deletes Other Processes From Disk
- Executes Processes stored in Temporary Folders
- Writes to another Process's Virtual Memory (Process Hijacking)
LIMEWIREWIN.EXE has been the subject of the following behaviors:
- Created as a process on disk
- Executed by Internet Explorer
- Writes to another Process's Virtual Memory (Process Hijacking)
- Executed as a Process
- Executed from Temporary Folders
- Deleted as a process from disk  ""
